headline: Carrier Unveils Bold New Brand Identity, Purpose and Tagline, Marking a New Era of Global Leadership
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, today announced the launch of a bold new brand identity and a powerful purpose statement: "Enhancing the lives we live and the world we share." This brand evolution reflects Carrier's strategic transformation and commitment to driving sustainable growth, innovation and global impact.
